command.name: AKICK
command.desc: AKICK is a command used to maintain channel autokick lists.
command.section: This command is provided for compatibility and ease-of-transition purposes only. It is recommended that you instead use the LISTAK, ADDAK, and DELAK commands to maintain your autokick lists. (see respectively /chanserv help listak, /chanserv help addak, and /chanserv help delak -- for more information)

ex.pre: To autokick the nick Carlton from #Dark:
To re-allow the nick Carlton on #Dark:
